Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the "consumer protection and automotive transparency act"
Summary: Enacts the consumer protection and automotive transparency act mandating transparency in automotive labeling relating to materials used in automobiles.
LawCode: Add ยง198-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "consumer protection and automotive transparency act"
